title: Mobile Mathematics Education Design for Socially Distanced Workplace Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and experience in using educational tools
context.additional_context: Designing math education programs using mobile devices in socially distanced work environments post-COVID-19. Learning technology-based solutions for in-service professionals to maintain work efficiency and safe working environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain math problem-solving procedures with 90% accuracy in social distancing environments using only mobile devices.
Learners can write result reports applying mathematical principles to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessments.
Learners can complete data analysis tasks by collaborating with team members using digital tools in limited technological environments (smartphones).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
